name: INSetDefrosterSettingsInCarIntent
desc: A request to change the defroster settings in a CarPlay-enabled vehicle.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(enable: Bool?, defroster: INCarDefroster, carName: INSpeakableString?)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified defroster information.

items.name: var enable: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether to enable or disable the defroster.

items.name: var defroster: INCarDefroster
items.desc: The defroster to enable or disable.

items.name: var carName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The name of the car you applied the settings to.
